front.title: Using DNS SRV to Specify a Global File Name Space with NFS version 4

abstract.t: The NFS version 4 protocol provides a natural way for a collection ofNFS file servers to collaborate in providing an organization-widefile name space. The DNS SRV RR allows a simple and appropriate wayfor an organization to publish the root of its name space, even toclients that might not be intimately associated with such anorganization. DNS SRV can be used to join these organization-widefile name spaces together to allow construction of a global, uniformNFS version 4 file name space. This document refreshes the draft.
